title: Exploratory Data Analysis
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
**EDA** is detective work. 
Use plots (Histograms, Scatter, Boxplots) to see patterns. 
- **Correlation Matrix**: Do features move together? (Multicollinearity).

examples.code: Salary vs Experience scatter plot shows positive linear trend.

common_mistakes.correction: Blind modeling leads to poor results. You might miss that 'Age' has negative values (errors).
